程序包 org.am21.model.items

类 Shelf

java.lang.Object
org.am21.model.items.Grid
org.am21.model.items.Shelf
public class Shelf extends Grid
This class is used to manage the shelves of the player

    构造器
    构造器
    说明
    Shelf(Player player)
    Construction of an empty shelves: Initialize the grid with superclass Create array, each elem count slot available for each column Row-Index-0 is on the top of the shelves

    • player

      public Player player

    • slotCol

      public List<Integer> slotCol
      Each element show how many slots are still available in correspondent column

    • insertLimit

      public int insertLimit
      Numbers of items insertable in the shelves each turn. Starting limit: 3. It's diminishable.

  • 构造器详细资料

    • Shelf

      public Shelf(Player player)
      Construction of an empty shelves: Initialize the grid with superclass Create array, each elem count slot available for each column Row-Index-0 is on the top of the shelves
      参数:
      player - player instance

  • 方法详细资料

    • checkLimit

      public void checkLimit()
      Calculate the min Limit for hand Capacity Example: If there are only column with 2 slots available, then 'handLimit' = 2

    • getTotSlotAvail

      public int getTotSlotAvail()
      number of slot available in total
      返回:
      Number of Total space available in this shelves

    • insertInColumn

      public boolean insertInColumn(ItemCard item, int col)
      Insert an itemCard in the column, then decrease the count in column (col) Check limit after insertion
      参数:
      item - ItemCard reference
      col - column for insertion
      返回:
      true if insertion has been successful

    • getGroupPoints

      public int getGroupPoints()
      This method is called at the end of the Game It will calculate the points according to a table. Having multiple item of the same type adjacent give different amount of points.

    • colorCounter

      public int colorCounter(int r, int c, boolean[][] visited, int depth, String type)
      Calculate the total points from shelf group points
      参数:
      r - root row of the backtracking
      c - root column of the backtracking
      visited - matrix of visited cells
      depth - depth of the backtracking
      type - type of item
      返回:
      number of item of the same type adjacent to each other

    • pointsTable

      public int pointsTable(int nItem)
      This method return the number of points gained due to a number of item adjacent to each other
      参数:
      nItem - number of item
      返回:
      points
